name: Cooking Urban Food Restaurant
description:
Cooking Urban Food, a new cooking game concept in which you can cook, train your waiters, upgrade your cooking tools for faster-paced cooking games and earn coins by becoming the best chef on different islands. All restaurant cooking games fans will love the practical and fast-paced gameplay, but also the possibility to upgrade your kitchen tools and your waiter's speed, tips chance, or waiting time.

Play like a professional top chef and make delicious street food for breakfast, lunch, or dinner!

Unlock a new food truck every couple of levels, learn new street food recipes like burger, sandwich, donuts, and more but also create the most beautiful platings in these addictive restaurant cooking games.

In this new restaurant game, we've gathered some of the most appreciated street food recipes in the world, which we've combined with beautiful graphics, and just like that, Cooking Urban Food, the best cooking game in 2020, came to life.

By playing this cool cooking game you may find yourself in an unforgettable adventure that will blow your mind and send you directly in the middle of the action inside the food truck's mobile kitchen around the world.

Not only you must cook faster and faster, but you will also have to
make decisions regarding your food truck business by deciding if you use your coins for upgrading tools, getting powerups, or just save as much as possible for the hard cooking levels.

After opening the burger kitchen food truck, you will meet the waiters that will guide you throughout all restaurant cooking games and please open your eyes and memorize what you see in our cooking games tutorial
so you won't have problems when preparing food for your team.

As a good restaurant manager, you need to manage your team of waiters by upgrading them using the stars won during the restaurant cooking games or upgrade your kitchen tools using coins. Check the messages from your team because the waiters will give you useful advice about what tools you should upgrade or unlock.

You won't get too comfortable playing the first cooking games and you will unlock all kinds of new features like tornado powerups, gifts coming from your waiters, combos if you cook fast, and a lot more.

New food trucks with worldwide street food recipes will keep getting unlocked so you can experience unforgettable moments playing our restaurant cooking game.

Our game is a race against time in the cooking games but also a restaurant management experience as you have to decide which tools you unlock and what waiters will get trained.
